title: Rusty’s Black Pepper Potato Chips - Crunchy & Healthy Chips for a Quick Bite - Gluten Free Chips, No Preservatives, Non-GMO, Vegan-Friendly Snack Pack - 3oz (Pack of 12)
features: BLACK PEPPER - Delight your taste buds with our black pepper potato chips & crisps. The thick and crunchy slices of the vegan chips are seasoned with fresh black pepper & French Mediterranean sun-dried salt that perfectly addresses random cravings.

INGREDIENTS - This pack of low-carb chips contains potatoes, expeller pressed safflower, sunflower oil, sea salt, and black pepper. It is Non-GMO, gluten-free and has no artificial colors, preservatives, or flavors.
MUNCHY-FRIENDLY SNACK PACK - The pack size is ideal for a quick and light munching session — the Rusty’s Potato Chips go well with our exciting range of salsa dips.

HANDMADE MANUFACTURING - We follow handmade manufacturing. The Bakersfield potatoes are washed and sliced, then slowly cooked in expeller pressed safflower oil. Post cooking, the snack chips are seasoned with black pepper and sea salt, then hand sealed in bags.

OUR COMMITMENT TO QUALITY - We create fine batches of snack packs at our Huntington Beach Kitchen with the best potatoes and ingredients. Our goal is to deliver the best quality chips with a distinct taste.
description: RUSTY’S BLACK PEPPER POTATO CHIPS - THICK & CRUNCHY HANDMADE CHIPS Rusty’s chips are among the few all-natural handmade potato chips worldwide. Why? Because it’s hard and takes time, care and effort. We don’t do it for the fame, we do it for the love of flavor. We slice our fresh potatoes by hand one at a time in a small vegetable slicer. Then we slow-cook the unprocessed slices in expeller pressed safflower oil. Once the slow cooking process is complete, we remove the chips from the light and healthy safflower oil. Then we gently season our chips with black pepper and French Mediterranean sun-dried sea salt. Each bag is then hand-filled and weighed one bag at a time by our team. To some, it may seem tedious, but we’ve discovered that by having an eye on every bag and doing smaller batches, we can do things the ultra-processed potato chip industry can never do. Our oils, flavorings, and salts would be diluted if we threw them on a conveyor belt and let the machines do the work. Want to improve your snacks game? Try Rusty Chips today!
